original_text: as we pray most earnestly night and day that we may see you face to face and supply what is lacking in your faith?
korean_text: 주야로 심히 간구함은 너희 얼굴을 보고 너희 믿음이 부족한 것을 보충하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: as we pray most earnestly night and day
that we may see you face to face
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 너희를 얼굴과 얼굴을 대하여 보게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: and supply what is lacking in your faith
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희 믿음에 부족한 것을 보충하려 함이라
